Login.string: Connected to server. Ready to login!
Failed to connect, retrying in {00} seconds.

Mapping.string: Are you sure you want to save your current map?
Do you want to save your current map?
Do you want to create a map here?
Are you sure you want to fill this layer?
Are you sure you want to erase this layer?
Are you sure you want to create a new, unconnected map?

MapGrid.string: Save a screenshot of the world
Are you sure you want to save a screenshot of your world to a file? This could take several minutes!
Are you sure you want to clear the existing previews and fetch previews for each map on this grid? This could take several minutes based on the number of maps in this grid!
Are you sure you want to fetch previews for each map? This could take several minutes based on the number of maps in this grid!
Use your current settings with the map cache? (No to disable lighting/fogs/other effects)
Are you sure you want to unlink map {00}?

MapList.string: Please select a folder or map to delete.
Please select a folder or map to rename.
Are you sure you want to delete {00}?

MapLayers.string: Double click a tile on the map to create an event!
Lower the maps brightness and double click on a tile to create a light!

MapProperties.string: The type of map this is.
Looping background music for this map.
Looping sound effect for this map.
How bright is this map? (Range: 0 to 100).
How large is the light around the player? (In pixels 0-1000)
How far into the light does the effect start fading? (0.00 to 1.00)
How strong the light is at its brightest point. (0 to 255)
Which color is the players light? (Default: White)
The amount of red in the overlay. (Range: 0 to 255)
The amount of green in the overlay. (Range: 0 to 255)
The amount of blue in the overlay. (Range: 0 to 255)
How strong the overlay appears. (Range: 0 [transparent/invisible] to 255 [solid/can't see map])
The overlayed image on the map. Generally used for fogs or sun beam effects.
How strong the fog overlay appears. (Range: 0 [transparent/invisible] to 255 [solid/can't see map])
This is an image that appears behind the map. It can be seen where no tiles are placed.
This is an image that appears above the map. (Not shown in editor.)

MainForm.string: Toggle Time of Day Simulation On/Off

% of HP/Mana to restore per tick.

CraftingEditor.string: Are you sure you want to delete this bench? This action cannot be reverted!
Are you sure you want to undo changes made to this bench? This action cannot be reverted!

DynamicRequirements.string: Below are condition lists. If conditions are met on any of the lists then the player can use the item.
Below are condition lists. If conditions are met on any of the lists then the player can harvest the resource.
Below are condition lists. If conditions are met on any of the lists then the player can use cast the spell.
Below are condition lists. If conditions are met on any of the lists then the player can start the quest.
Below are condition lists. If conditions are met on any of the lists then the event can spawn/run.

TaskEditor.string: Event Driven: The description should lead the player to an event. The event will then complete the task using the complete quest task command.

TimeEditor.string: Enter 1 for normal rate of time. Values larger than one for faster days. Values between 0 and 1 for longer days. Negative values for time to flow backwards.
Double click the panel above to change the overlay color.

EventEditor.string: Do you want to save changes to this event?
